remarks: The intersection of partial isomorphism B closed subspaces is a closed subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Mar-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dibintcl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dibintcl.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoB ` K ) ` W ) $.
dibintclN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( S C_ ran I /\ S =/= (/) ) ) -> |^| S e. ran I ) $.
